TAGS.TITLE: Теги
TAGS.DESCRIPTION: При помощи тегов вашу Историю проще найти

SOCIAL.TITLE: Внешний вид в соцсетях
SOCIAL.DESCRIPTION: Как будет выглядеть ваша История в соцсетях

ABOUT.TITLE: Что такое История?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
История (Story) – это первый в мире инструмент для создания статей, который позволяет авторам
 разбить повествование на увлекательные фрагменты и предложить 
читателям визуализированное, интерактивное, захватывающее путешествие.
ABOUT.STEP_3: Поделитесь или разместите на своем сайте

ERROR.SAVING_DISABLED: Сохранение отключено. Пожалуйста, повторите попытку через 5 минут

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Highlight words of wisdom by creating a designed quote.
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Short and sweet; keep your quotes to the point and easy to read.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include an image of who said it next to the quote to give your readers context and more information.

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Make readers feel as though they are reading someone’s text messages!
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Choose the template that enables you to upload images for all of the Convo participants.You can add text and images to each message bubble!
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Convo template that looks and feels like iOS messenger.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use Convo to create a list or timeline of events. Simply upload a number or date as the image for each “participant”.

GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Embed Google maps to show your readers a specific location.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include any video from Vimeo in your article.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Embed Twitter posts to make your content more interesting and engaging.
GALLERY.TEXT_4_LABEL: Embed Instagram posts to make your content more visually stunning.

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Add stunning images and make your visuals stand out by adding a blur or zoom-in effect
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Surprise your readers by blurring an image. Clicking to reveal the image gives them an interactive and engaging content experience!
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Draw your readers' attention to the focal point of an image using the Zoom filter.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the blur effect to give readers the choice to decide if they want to see graphic content or not.

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Use text to form the base for your Story.
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use the text marker to highlight the most important parts in your text.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Your reader's’ eye will immediately be drawn to the highlighted text. Make sure to highlight the important parts that they need to read.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Include emojis and hyperlinks to make your text more interactive and interesting!

SETTINGS.TITLE: НАСТРОЙКИ ОПРОСА
SETTINGS.DISPLAY_LOGO_DESCRIPTION:
Применить дополнительные персональные настройки, добавив ваше лого. 
Изменить ваше изображение
SETTINGS.END_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Добиться большего участия и вовлечения с помощью карточки в конце

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Polls allow readers to express their opinion and respond to the content you create.
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use a poll to getting your readers involved. Give them a chance to throw in their 2 cents! For example, asking what they think about something on social media.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use a cover image for your Poll to make your question more visual and exciting.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use a background image and choose the Grid template to create a visually awesome poll that is fun to interact with!
GALLERY.TEXT_4_LABEL: Remember to always include a “none of the above” option to give your readers an easy out if none of the options suit them.

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: In the age of TL;DR, Summary gets straight to the point and give readers only the information they need. They can be used in different ways...
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use Summary to wrap-up the main points of any topic. Give your audience the big picture in a series of succinct points. Include a cover image to tie the Summary into the topic of your article.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Summary template for recipes to include a sidebar for ingredients. Include a beautiful visual to make your Summary more interesting.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the check-box feature to create a to-do list using Summary.

GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use any video on Vimeo to make your article more interesting.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use any video on Youtube to make your article more interesting.

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Incorporate video in a more flexible and low-cost manner. Simply customize our readymade templates, choose a color palette and add the right sound.
GALLERY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use the classic template to create a video list with GIFs and images.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Vs. template to compare and contrast a topic that your readers care about.
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Every screen in the Vs. template will compare a subtopic under the larger comparison with text, images and GIFs!
GALLERY.TEXT_4_LABEL: Use the Facts template to list facts about something important to your readers.
GALLERY.TEXT_5_LABEL: Each slide in a Facts video has large text over a background image.
GALLERY.TEXT_6_LABEL: Use the Swift template to create a quicker video with a an intro screen that automatically pulls visuals from all of your video’s slides.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.LOGO_DESCRIPTION: Upload your own logo to make your mark and increase brand awareness

GALLERY.TITLE_LABEL: Surprise your readers by displaying images and text cards that readers can click to flip and reveal the other side.
GALLERY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use flip-card to reveal something to your readers. Surprise, shock, and entertain them! This is also great for “before and after” comparisons!
GALLERY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use Flip-card to filter what your readers see. Give them the choice to decide if they want to see adult content or not.

DELETE_SECTION_MESSAGE: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить это содержание?
